about_the_game:
Welcome to Pennybrook, a sleepy small town where nothing bad ever happens, except for the hordes of nightmarish creatures wrecking chaos that is! Team up with your friends to banish these terrifying BEASTS and uncover the secrets of where they come from. Pennybrook might not be as sleepy as it seems.

KEY FEATURES:
- A cast of playable characters each with unique weapons and abilities
- Compact replayable adventures that conclude with adrenaline-charged finales
- Expressive and satisfying hack-and-slash combat
- Our "Dynamic AI Director" (DAD) ensures monsters always find new ways to tantalize and terrify you
- Our “Map Outline Maker” (MOM) creates procedurally generated levels so no two runs are the same
- Mix and match abilities, weapons, and upgrades for unique and creative builds
- Ongoing progression to unlock new upgrades, abilities, characters, and more!
- Play Online or Couch Co-op
- Play solo or as a group of up to 4 friends
- Two types of sprawling procedural environments with many levels to explore and survive (with more being added!)
- Massive hordes of enemies, and over a dozen unique special elite monsters that hound your every step.
- Two horrific and huge BEASTS that summon armies of monstrous creatures.
- Lots of yummy snacks that give you a wild variety of abilities! (In the game. Real physical snacks not included.)




Run rampant with this cast of adorable misfits! Each one of these beast-hunting kids wields a unique weapon along with an unbridled childlike thirst for chaos. Equip magical cooperative abilities and level up with yummy snacks! The monsters in the dark might be scary, but they are no match for the terrifying power of friendship and food!



The "Dynamic AI Director" (or DAD for short) and the “Map Outline Maker” (referred to as MOM) work together to procedurally generate levels and dynamically spawn obstacles and AI monsters. MOM and DAD ensure that your actions, decisions, team composition, skills, and even your attitude affects the types of terror you will face every run.



BEASTS are boss-level monsters whose names are only said in hushed whispers. These enormous ancient and terrible monsters will truly test your mettle. Learn their strengths and weaknesses as you face them at the end of each procedural campaign. Every time you defeat a BEAST it will return stronger (and madder) than ever. Only through persistence and teamwork can you banish these monsters (for good?!) BEGONE BEAST!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: BEGONE BEAST is a spooky top-down action game for 1-4 players. HACK & SLASH & SCREAM through hordes of demons, endlessly changing levels, and ancient terrifying BEASTS. Harness the power of SNACKS, FLASHLIGHTS, and FRIENDSHIP in this scary (but also cute) race for survival!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
